Question:
Can communication between processors be performed between the Cortex-A55 (Linux) and Cortex-M33 (FreeRTOS) incorporated in the RZ/G3S?
Answer:
We provide RZ/G3S Multi-OS Package that can use OpenAMP which is an API with a standardized framework for communication between processors. 
By using this package, you can use Free RTOS with Cortex-M33 and create an application that links Linux and RTOS using OpenAMP.
Please also refer to the user's manual (https://www.renesas.com/us/en/document/mah/rzg3s-group-users-manual-hardware?r=25458591), 12. Message Handling Unit (MHU).
Suitable Products
RZ/G3S
